subject: Daytona 500 (Auto Race)
Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Jack Hege has driven from North Carolina to watch all 51 of the Daytona 500 races, and he’ll be back in his accustomed seat on Sunday.
snippet: Jack Hege has driven from North Carolina to watch all 51 of the Daytona 500 races, and he’ll be back in his accustomed seat on Sunday.
